document.full_text: oil fell sharply on monday after ratings agency s&p revised lower its u.s. credit outlook to negative and opec ministers said high crude prices could place a major strain on consumer countries' economies.
document.title: oil falls on s&p u.s. outlook revision, demand worry
lines_and_colors: oil fell sharply on monday after ratings agency s&p revised lower its u.s. credit outlook to negative and opec ministers said high crude prices could place a major strain on consumer countries' economies.
